channel.title: I need help client dont work
channel.description: hi when i play client or run bats or batch files they dont work but then i download java fomr java.com and every think works evan the client but when its done loading and i walk it just closes how do i fix it? plz help! :(

item.title: I need help client dont work
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

U have to click right click on the compiler or run.bat and then you find something like this!

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” ./files/*.java" or something!

Then you change the jdk version like this! (change to your jdk version!)

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java

Volla it works

Read full topic
item.source: I need help client dont work
